message: Let's start with a fair split. You can try to do better in the next round if you want.
You're being too generous, I'll take this deal
You think you're getting a good deal, but I'm not going to let you take all the profit!
You're getting greedy, Bob! I'll meet you halfway, but don't expect me to give in completely.
You're getting closer, but I'm not done yet
You're still trying to take a bit too much, Bob. I'm not done negotiating!
You're getting desperate, Bob. I'm not budging much more. Take it or leave it!
It's time to split the difference
Alright, Bob. You've worn me down. Let's split the difference and call it a day!
